item.description:
Winedown @ Harvard Book Store
Unhurried conversation and a Taste of Ice Cream.

This is a Harvard Book Store event.

Help Sally Sampson celebrate the publication of her latest book “Ice Cream: 52 Easy Recipes for Year-Round Frozen Treats”. Toscanini’s founder and Co-author Gus Rancatore will provide a sampling of frozen treats, compliments of The Harvard Book Store and Toscanini’s.

Note: Support your local independent bookstore (& ice creamery); they're disappearing fast.

S.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have the Renoir pinned to my jacket pocket. I'm not hard to find.
item.name: Winedown @ Harvard Book Store
